text.section: This section applies in Harford County.
The owner of a female dog that is in heat may not allow the dog to be out of doors either loose or on a leash.

A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction:
For a first violation, is subject to a fine of $25; and
For each subsequent violation, is subject to a fine of not less than $100 and not exceeding $200.
